development.note: Out of the box, the predix-webapp-starter app uses mock data, so these values are not required.  Set these values for connecting to real Predix services.
development.uaaURL: {The UAA URI end point to get auth token }
development.base64ClientCredential: {Get clientID:clientSecret for services then base64 encode and place it here}
development.loginBase64ClientCredential: {Get clientID:clientSecret for app login then base64 encode and place it here}
development.timeseriesZoneId: {The Zone ID for the Timeseries Service Created}
development.assetZoneId: {The Zone ID for the Asset Service Created}
